attributes.action: Under no circumstances let the Falklands fall, or be harassed by Argentina
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Argentina continues to harass Britain to hand the Falklands over to them.  However, the islanders wish to remain British.  This petition is to ensure no Prime Minister will hand the Falklands over, even under threat of military action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
